question:
Which among the following recommendations made by the Frazer commission is/ are correct?
1. It recommended direct recruitment to the higher post
2. Investigation of offenses should be conducted on the spot
3. Setting up of the Criminal Investigation Department in every province
4. The provincial police force should be increased
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Fraser Commission was appointed in the year 1902. It had recommended direct recruitment to the higher post rather than the promotion from lower post. Setting up of the Criminal Investigation Department in every province was recommended. It had recommended an increase in the Provincial police force. According to the commission investigation of offenses should be conducted on spot.
